targets.rawSql: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(max(time), "%W %d %M %T") as last_time FROM linky_realtime

(
SELECT
	PAPP * (SELECT (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 24 / AVG(PAPP) FROM linky_realtime WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as current
FROM linky.linky_realtime
ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION
(SELECT
    (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 24 * 2 as average
FROM linky_realtime
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)

options.referenceText: comparé à la moyenne du mois

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
 "current",
    (((MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP)) * $prix_hp + (MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) * $prix_hc)  / 1000) + ($abonnement / getNbDaysCurrentPeriod())as total_kwh
FROM linky_realtime
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
UNION
(SELECT 
	"base",
    (((MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP)) * $prix_hp + (MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) * $prix_hc) / 1000 / getNbDaysCurrentPeriod()) + ($abonnement / getNbDaysCurrentPeriod()) as total_kwh
FROM linky_history
WHERE time BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL getNbDaysCurrentPeriod() DAY AND NOW())

SELECT 
  $__timeGroupAlias(time, $__interval, previous), 
  PAPP * (SELECT (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 24 / AVG(PAPP) FROM linky_realtime WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS "Puissance apparente" 
FROM linky.linky_realtime 
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

(SELECT
 "current",
    (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 24 as total_kwh
FROM linky_realtime
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
UNION
(SELECT 
	"base",
    (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 24 as total_kwh
FROM linky_history
WHERE time BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL 2 DAY AND NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)

(SELECT "current", total_kwh * 1000 / 24 / getNbDaysCurrentPeriod() as t FROM monthly_history ORDER BY provider_time DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION
(SELECT "base", total_kwh * 1000 / 24 / getNbDaysCurrentPeriod() as t FROM monthly_history ORDER BY provider_time DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1)

(SELECT "current", (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 24 / 365 as t FROM linky_history WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
UNION
(SELECT "base", total_kwh * 1000 / 24 / 365 as t FROM yearly_history ORDER BY provider_time DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1)
SELECT provider_time, total_hp_kwh, total_hc_kwh FROM monthly_history ORDER BY provider_time ASC

(SELECT "current", $abonnement + (total_hp_kwh * $prix_hp) + (total_hc_kwh * $prix_hc) as t FROM monthly_history ORDER BY provider_time DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION
(SELECT "base", $abonnement + (total_hp_kwh * $prix_hp) + (total_hc_kwh * $prix_hc) as t FROM monthly_history ORDER BY provider_time DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1)

SELECT
(SELECT
    (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000
FROM linky_history
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
-
(SELECT 
    (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000
FROM linky_history
WHERE time BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY - INTERVAL getNbDaysCurrentPeriod() DAY AND NOW() - INTERVAL getNbDaysCurrentPeriod() DAY + INTERVAL 1 HOUR)
SELECT provider_time, total_hp_kwh, total_hc_kwh FROM yearly_history ORDER BY provider_time ASC

(
  SELECT "current", $abonnement + (((total_hp_kwh * $prix_hp) + (total_hc_kwh * $prix_hc)) / 12) as t FROM yearly_history ORDER BY provider_time DESC LIMIT 1
)
UNION
(
  SELECT "base", $abonnement + ((total_hp_kwh * $prix_hp) + (total_hc_kwh * $prix_hc)) / 12 as t FROM yearly_history ORDER BY provider_time DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1
)

SELECT
(SELECT
    (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000
FROM linky_history
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
-
(SELECT 
    (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000
FROM linky_history
WHERE time BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY - INTERVAL 365 DAY AND NOW() - INTERVAL 365 DAY + INTERVAL 1 HOUR)

SELECT (SELECT ROUND(((MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 24) / AVG(PAPP), 2) FROM linky_realtime) as "Cos φ", 
       PAPP,
       HCHP/1000 AS "Heures Pleines", 
       HCHC/1000 AS "Heures Creuses"
FROM linky.linky_realtime
ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
